definition: surgeon/as opposed to physician 內科醫生|内科医生[nei4 ke1 yi1 sheng1], who works primarily by administering drugs
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

pinyin: zheng3 xing2 wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1

sentences.english: A surgeon asked him what's his surname.
sentences.chinese: 一名外科醫生問他姓什麼。

sentences.english: I doubt many surgeons inthe U.S. are currently using it.
sentences.chinese: 不過我估計美國還有不少外科醫生在用腸線。

sentences.english: Garwood says there is a critical need for surgeons.
sentences.chinese: Garwood表示，現在亟需外科醫生。
外科醫生救了這條重達60磅的爬蟲。

sentences.english: The surgeon set her broken arm.
sentences.chinese: 外科醫生爲她接好斷臂。

sentences.english: These tests allow the surgeon to look inside of the colon.
sentences.chinese: 以上這些檢查可以讓外科醫生看到結腸內部的情況。

sentences.english: The surgeon visits to discuss the cases twice a week.
sentences.chinese: 外科醫生每兩週例行會診並討論病例。

sentences.english: Two weeks later, surgeons carried out the operation to rebuild his face.
sentences.chinese: 兩週後，外科醫生實施了手術以復原他的面部。

sentences.english: By an act of sheer self-discipline he had made himself a surgeon.
sentences.chinese: 他完全靠着苦學，把自己訓練成一個外科醫生。

sentences.english: He surpassed other surgeons in skills.
sentences.chinese: 他的技術超過其他的外科醫生。

sentences.english: Yesterday, this well-known surgeon operated on a lung-cancer patient.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，這位著名的外科醫生給一個肝癌患者做了手術。

sentences.english: The surgeon's preference will also influence the receptiveness of a patient to a regional technique.
sentences.chinese: 外科醫生的偏愛也影響病人接受神經阻滯。

sentences.english: Your surgeon may wish to discuss these with you.
sentences.chinese: 你的外科醫生可能會和你討論這些問題。

sentences.english: A doctor's surgery which collapsed in Melbourne, Australia.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲墨爾本一個外科醫生的手術室垮掉了。

sentences.english: The young surgeon showed exceptional competence.
sentences.chinese: 這位年輕的外科醫生具有不尋常的才幹。

definition: variant of 弗吉尼亞州|弗吉尼亚州/Virginia, US state
Franklin/Benjamin Franklin (1706-1790), US Founding Father, scientist and author/surname Franklin
Macbeth (name)/Macbeth, 1606 tragedy by William Shakespeare 莎士比亞|莎士比亚
